main.title: Sign Up for UDC 2020
description: UDC 2020 Sign-up is available from November 6th (Fri) to November 26th (Thu).
Upbit Developer Conference 2020 is a free online event.
Sign up to receive email updates and the official UDC 2020 newsletter.
All who sign up will be entered into a raffle to win mobile coupons. There could be a restriction on using the coupons if you are not a resident of South Korea.
Please note that your phone number and password will be required to confirm or modify your sign-up details.

Please contact the UDC 2020 Secretariat if you haven't received a confirmation e-mail after completing your sign-up.
[UDC Secretariat] e-mail: udc_reg@upbit.com

step1.title: 1. Terms and Conditions
step1.totalAgreeCheckboxText: By Checking this box, I agree to the UDC 2020 Privacy Policy and to receive promotional material via email.
step1.agreePopUpText: You must agree to the terms and conditions for the collection and use of personal information (required)
step1.over14Text: Age verification required. You must be over the age of 14 years to use this service.
step1.checkbox1Text:
Please review the agreement(s) below and agree by selecting the checkbox(es),
You must agree with the terms of these agreements to continue.
step1.checkbox2Text:
(Option) Receive promotional e-mails
* Please agree with the terms of Promotional e-mails agreement to receive promotional information about UDC 2020.
step1.checkbox3Text:
Age verification complete(14 or older)
* You must be 14 or older to use this service. Please check if you are 14 or older.
step1.portraitAgreement: â€» The user has the right to refuse consent to the collection and use of his or her personal information, and there is no disadvantage even if the user refuses to consent. However, if the user refuses to give consent for the required consent(mandatory), he or she shall face limitations in using some services.

step2.title: 2. Attendee Information
step2.alreadyRegisteredPhoneNumber: This mobile phone number is already registered.
step2.alreadyRegisteredPhoneNumber_m: This mobile phone number is already registered.
step2.checkDupSuccess: This phone number is available to use. Please continue.

for sign-up can be requested by e-mail to the UDC 2020 Secretariat.
